name: Rite of Titans
description:
Rite of Titans is a Free to Play hero-centric 3v3 action game - currently in the alpha stage. Master the moves and outplay your rivals in an epic, fast-paced hybrid of arcade sports and ability-based competition.

We are launching our Early Access with a fully functional arena, 3 available heroes, and the ability to join games through online matchmaking. This is the earliest alpha version of our game – and the first time Rite of Titans is available to play for regular players.

Features we have currently planned (please keep in mind that this is not necessarily the order in which they will be added to the game, as your feedback will have a large impact on our priorities):
- an additional arena map
- equipment and an inventory system
- player accounts and a progression system
- skins and consumables
- custom rooms
- AI and bots
- new heroes
We will also keep a close eye on overall design and balance to make sure our game remains fair and fun for all players.
We also are looking to release on Consoles, but this will only be considered after we leave Early Access. Our current focus is to make a kickass PC game.
